title: Christian Video Editor (Adobe Premiere)
job_overview:
We’re looking for dedicated and skilled Video Editors to support churches by editing sermon videos, church events, marketing materials, and more.

This is a faith-based role, and we’re looking for someone who understands Christian values, is familiar with the Bible and church culture, and ideally has experience serving on a church’s media team.

Qualifications:
- Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro (please do not apply if you only use CapCut or mobile editors)
- Strong editing skills for long-form content (e.g., sermons) and short-form clips (e.g., event promos, social media content)
- Must be a Christian and familiar with Christian terminology, themes, and values
- Excellent attention to detail and storytelling in a church context
- Good communication skills and ability to take creative direction

Preferred Experience:
- Has volunteered or worked on video/media projects for a church
- Comfortable handling raw footage and creating engaging final edits for sermons, worship services, and church promotions

Responsibilities:
- Edit weekly sermon videos
- Create short clips for social media and outreach
- Produce highlight reels of church events
- Collaborate with the church team for new video projects
- Maintain consistency with the church's branding and message
